headline: Human Papilloma Virus (HPV) Test and Pap Smear/Test Market Research and Forecast Report 2025-2030, Competitive Analysis of Market leaders - Hologic, BD, Roche, QIAGEN, and Danaher
summary: The HPV testing and Pap test market is set to grow from USD 2.44 billion in 2025 to USD 3.94 billion by 2030, with a CAGR of 10.0%. This growth is fueled by increased awareness of cervical cancer and government-led screening initiatives. Consumables lead the market, driven by demand for reagents and collection kits essential for testing.
